error.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
error.500: Internal server error. Please try again later.
error.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
error.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
error.form.invalid: Some fields are invalid. Please review and try again.
error.email.invalid: The email address is not valid.
error.upload.failed: File upload failed. Please try again.
error.save.failed: Could not save your changes. Please try again.
error.delete.failed: Failed to delete the item. Please try again.
error.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
error.session.expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
error.validation: Validation error. Please check your input.
error.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
